actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to extend for three years the existing duty free treatment of certain needlecraft display models, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through June 30, 1988, the duty-free treatment of certain needlecraft display models and aprons and baby bibs. Provides a refund on any duty paid on such articles that enter the United States on a specified date and before the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend for three years the existing duty free treatment of certain needlecraft display models, and for other purposes.
